programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: Biographical drama starring Adam Driver and Penélope Cruz. Enzo Ferrari and his wife Laura have equal shares in their car-manufacturing company, but their marriage is in tatters following the death of their son, while the business is in financial peril. With the 1957 Mille Miglia endurance race looming, Enzo seeks victory for Ferrari, whatever the cost Michael Mann - Director Adam Driver - Enzo Ferrari Penélope Cruz - Laura Ferrari Shailene Woodley - Lina Lardi Sarah Gadon - Linda Christian Gabriel Leone - Alfonso de Portago Jack O'Connell - Peter Collins Patrick Dempsey - Piero Taruffi.

programme.title: Arthur's Whisky
programme.desc: When Joan's husband dies, she discovers he'd invented an anti-aging elixir that literally takes the years off. Sharing it with her friends Linda and Susan, the rejuvenated women waste little time in painting the town red, but they soon realise it's a very different world to the one they remember. Co-writer/director Stephen Cookson's comedy, starring Diane Keaton, Hayley Mills, Patricia Hodge, Lulu and David Harewood Stephen Cookson - Director Patricia Hodge - Joan Diane Keaton - Linda Lulu - Susan Hayley Mills - Karen David Harewood - Hal Bill Paterson - Henry Boy George - Boy George Joanna David - Rachel Jaime Winstone - Sharon.

programme.title: Night Swim
programme.desc: Forced into early retirement by a degenerative illness, former baseball player Ray Waller moves into a new house with his wife and two children. He hopes that the backyard swimming pool will be fun for the kids and provide physical therapy for himself. However, a dark secret from the home's past soon unleashes a malevolent force that drags the family into the depths of inescapable terror. Writer/director Bryce McGuire's horror, starring Wyatt Russell and Kerry Condon Bryce McGuire - Director Wyatt Russell - Ray Waller Kerry Condon - Eve Waller Amélie Hoeferle - Izzy Waller Gavin Warren - Elliot Waller Nancy Lenehan - Kay.

programme.sub-title: Action, Comedy, Family, Drama, Sci Fi, Animation, Crime/detective, Children's ║ 2010 ║ U
programme.desc: Animated comedy featuring the voice of Steve Carell. Behind the seemingly tranquil façade of small-town America, super-criminal Gru plots his biggest heist yet: to steal the Moon. programme.title: The Fast and the Furious
programme.desc: Action thriller starring Paul Walker and Vin Diesel. When illegal street racer Dominic Toretto is suspected of being the mastermind behind a series of truck hijacks, undercover police officer Brian O'Conner is sent to infiltrate his gang. But O'Conner's judgement becomes clouded when he falls in love with Toretto's sister, Mia Rob Cohen - Director Paul Walker - Brian Earl Spilner / Officer Brian O'Conner Vin Diesel - Dominic Toretto Michelle Rodriguez - Letty Jordana Brewster - Mia Toretto Rick Yune - Johnny Tran Chad Lindberg - Jesse Johnny Strong - Leon Ted Levine - Sgt Tanner Matt Schulze - Vince.

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.sub-title: Action, Romance, Thriller, Drama, Sci Fi, Fantasy ║ 2023 ║ 12A
programme.desc: Epic sci-fi drama starring Timothée Chalamet and Zendaya. With the evil Harkonnen family back in charge of Arrakis, deposed heir Paul Atreides and his mother have taken refuge with the native Fremen in the planet's perilous desert wasteland. Paul becomes close with Fremen warrior Chani and begins to demonstrate powers that persuade her people to aid in the young man's plan to avenge his father and take back control Denis Villeneuve - Director Timothée Chalamet - Paul Atreides Zendaya - Chani Austin Butler - Feyd-Rautha Harkonnen Florence Pugh - Princess Irulan Corrino Rebecca Ferguson - Lady Jessica Atreides Javier Bardem - Stilgar Léa Seydoux - Lady Margot Christopher Walken - Emperor Shaddam IV Josh Brolin - Gurney Halleck Stellan Skarsgård - Baron Vladimir Harkonnen Charlotte Rampling - Reverend Mother Mohiam Dave Bautista - Glossu Rabban Harkonnen Anya Taylor-Joy - Alia Atreides.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: High school outcasts Janis Sarkisian and Damian Hubbard narrate the tale of 15-year-old Cady Heron, who moves back to America from Kenya with her mother. Janis encourages Cady to infiltrate the Plastics, ruled by the formidable Regina George, but when she does, the clique soon corrupts the new girl. programme.title: The Exorcist: Believer
programme.desc: Single parent Victor Fielding raises his daughter Angela, 13 years after the death of his pregnant wife in a Haitian earthquake. He is alarmed when Angela and her friend Katherine vanish in the woods and return three days later with no memory of their ordeal. A shocking chain of events convinces Victor that his daughter's soul is at stake and he calls upon Chris MacNeil to help him confront an ancient evil. programme.title: 1st Test'24: PAK v ENG - D2 Hlts
programme.desc: Day two of the opening Test between Pakistan and England in Multan. Centuries from Shan Masood and Abdullah Shafique see Pakistan resume play on 328 for four. (08.10).

programme.title: 1st Test'24: PAK v ENG - D3 Hlts
programme.desc: Day three of England's opening Test match of three against Pakistan in Multan. The tourists resume play on 96 for one in reply to Pakistan's mammoth score of 556 all out. (09.10).

programme.title: 1st Test'24: PAK v ENG - D4 Hlts
programme.desc: Day four of the first Test in Multan. England's new leading run-scorer in Test cricket Joe Root returns to the crease as the tourists close in on Pakistan's total of 556 all out. (10.10).

programme.title: 1st Test'24: PAK v ENG - D5 Hlts
programme.desc: An 86-over record partnership of 454 between England's Joe Root and Harry Brook has the tourists on the brink of a memorable win, as Pakistan trail by 115 runs on day five. (11.10).

programme.desc: In the dying embers of an 2018-19 Sky Bet Championship clash at Villa Park, Kemar Roofe's last-gasp goal sealed a famous Leeds comeback having trailed 2-0 to Aston Villa.

programme.title: EFL 17/18: Leeds v Bristol City
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL. Here, Leeds United host Bristol City at Elland Road in the Sky Bet Championship in a match that saw a dramatic comeback.

programme.title: EFL 17/18: Arsenal v Man City
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the EFL Cup. Here, Arsenal and Man City go head-to-head in the final of the 2017-18 competition at Wembley.

programme.title: EFL 17/18: Aston Villa v Wolves

programme.title: PGA Championship Round 2 Hlts
programme.desc: The second round of the 2025 PGA Championship at Quail Hollow Golf Club. (16.05).

programme.title: PSL: Lahore v Karachi Hlts
programme.desc: Undefeated in their last three matches, Lahore take on David Warner's Karachi Kings in the PSL. Karachi returned to winning ways on Thursday, with James Vince the star of the show. (04.05).

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Leics/Man U '14
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the Premier League. Here, Leicester City host Manchester United in an eight-goal thriller at the King Power Stadium back in 2014.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Man Utd/Derby'97
programme.desc: Relive a Premier League classic. Here, Derby County visit Manchester United at Old Trafford back in 1997 on what would be one of the Rams' most memorable Premier League afternoons.

programme.title: PL Greatest: B'mouth/Liverpool '16
programme.desc: A chance to relive a Premier League classic. Here, Bournemouth host Liverpool at the Vitality Stadium in the 2016-17 season in a game that saw the Cherries complete a thrilling comeback.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Arsenal/Spurs 2010
programme.desc: A chance to relive a Premier League classic. Here, Arsenal take on Spurs in a memorable five-goal north London derby at the Emirates in 2010, in a game that saw a stunning comeback.

programme.title: Golf Academy: McGinley Putting
programme.desc: Former European Ryder Cup star Paul McGinley joins the Golf Academy as he leads you through the ways to practice perfect putting.

programme.title: Golf Academy:Harrington Short Game
programme.desc: The Golf Academy offers guidance and all the key tips and tricks on how to make your golfing game even stronger. Here, Padraig Harrington on how to improve your short game.

programme.title: EFL 21/22: Coventry City v Fulham
programme.desc: In October 2021, Coventry took Fulham to the sword, putting four past the travelling west Londoners who eventually went on to secure Premier League promotion.

programme.title: EFL 21/22: Blackburn v Fulham
programme.desc: In a Sky Bet Championship encounter to remember for the visitors - and one to forget for the hosts - the travelling Fulham put seven unanswered goals past a hapless Blackburn at Ewood Park.

programme.title: The Best of England v Australia
programme.desc: Remember some of the most incredible individual performances in Ashes history. Here, a look at Adam Gilchrist's excellent performances with the bat in the 2001 series.

programme.title: The Best of England v Australia
programme.desc: Remember some of the most incredible individual performances in Ashes history. This episode covers Glenn McGrath's dominant 2001 Ashes, which saw him named Player of the Series.

programme.title: Indy 500: Qualifying 3
programme.desc: The opening day of NTT IndyCar Series qualification for the 109th Running of the Indianapolis 500 continues.

programme.title: Ted's Quali Notebook
programme.desc: Ted Kravitz is live as he gathers reaction from inside the paddock and reviews all the biggest stories from qualifying at the Emilia Romagna Grand Prix.
